== 1.3.1 2008-07-12

* 1 major enhancement:
  * Initial release
* 2 tiny enhancement:
  * fixed specifications
* 3 minor enhancement
  * tap is now a synonym for me
* 4 minor enhancement
  * Object#dont
* 5 bug fix
  * Plays well with other patch-artists
* 6 minor enhancement
  * uses existing BlankSlate class if already defined
* 7 tiny enhancement
  * use BasicObject as well
